articles.description: Jose Mourinho has become the latest high-profile name to pay tribute to Zlatan Ibrahimovic after he announced his retirement from football.

articles.title: Lakshya Sen returns to world's top 20 after a good show at Thailand Open - The Bridge
articles.description: Indian shuttler Lakshya Sen returned to World top 20 in BWF rankings after a good show at Thailand Open 2023.
articles.content:
Star Indian shuttler Lakshya Sen returned to the world's top 20 after a good show at the Thailand Open in the latest released BWF World rankings on Tuesday.
